DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the use of Sorafenib additionally to gemcitabine and cisplatin in bladder cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Sorafenib in Urothelium Cancer of Bladder
DOC.detailed_description: A controlled, double-blind, randomized study to evaluate the influence of Sorafenib in bladder cancer patients additionally to chemotherapy with gemcitabine and cisplatin compared to placebo.
